page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT 3
page.content: social worker, whose wife sells plants which she grows herself, a blacksmith, a mountaineering guide, the local shopkeepers and the manager of the Cromarty Firth Port Authority. Some of these travel daily into Inverness or Dingwall. Unfortunately there are few opportunities for work for school leavers in the area, and they often have to take jobs as shop assistants and the like in Fortrose, Dingwall or Inverness. Travelling is very difficuilt for these young people as there is only one bus a day in each direction. Fortunately neighbours are kind and helpful and often provide lifts in their cars.
